# Tender Notice
## Spectrophotometers

Reference Number: PW-22-01004551
Date Published: August 31, 2022
Closing Date: September 14, 2022, 1:00 PM Atlantic Daylight Time (ADT)

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

### Tender Category
Refurbished/used Goods and Services

### Requested Goods or Services
The Department of National Defence requires six (6) HACH DR1900-01H Portable Spectrophotometers or equivalent.

### Trade Agreement
This notice is reserved for suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada.

### Contracting Entity
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Dr
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2

### Contact Information
Aaron Pound
Aaron.Pound@forces.gc.ca
506-422-7891

### Instructions
Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid. Suppliers can purchase these goods as part of their existing arrangement. The department reserves the right to request the goods be fiscally available to the end user prior to contract award. No online bidding will be conducted.

### Deliverables
The successful bidder will be required to supply six (6) spectrophotometers that meet the minimum performance requirements outlined in the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/C, available on Buyandsell.gc.ca.

### Evaluation Criteria
Suppliers will be evaluated on the goods they supply, based on their responsiveness to the solicitation requirements, and the aggregate price for the goods.

### Classification
This notice is classified as a procurement priority under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
